text: Daniel Carvajal Ramos (born 11 January 1992) is a Spanish footbaler. He plays as a right-back for Real Madrid C.F. and the Spain national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League National cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals
